<title level="1" pfs="">[Joon-seo](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1505)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Joon-seo](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1505)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Samsaran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=362" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +28

**Languages**
[Minatan](/Languages.aspx?ID=90), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 250

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_whip_ +28 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d4+8 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sound blast +28 ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)),
**Damage** 4d6 sonic

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 36
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [Prismatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=234) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [True Target](/Spells.aspx?ID=346) (3 slots)
- **8th**
[Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Spirit Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=303) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 36, 3 Focus Points
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Inspire Defense](/Spells.aspx?ID=387), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **8th**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388), [Lingering Composition](/Spells.aspx?ID=389)

</column>
name: Joon-seo
